mapper.select: select if(count(USER_ID) > 0, 'Y', 'N') AS EXISTS_YN from USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
select if(count(USER_ID) > 0, 'Y' 'N') as EXISTS_YN from USER_INFO where EMAIL = #{email}
mapper.insert: insert into USER_INFO (USER_ID, USER_NAME, PASSWORD, EMAIL, ADDR1, ADDR2, REG_ID, REG_DT, CHG_ID, CHG_DT) value (#{userId},#{userName},#{password},#{email},#{addr1},#{addr2},#{userId},NOW(),#{userId},NOW())
